title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.4 - Prohibited equipment
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 128.4 - Prohibited equipment

State Regulations

Equipment with chains, armored tires, lugs, etc. will not
be permitted on the pavement area, pursuant to the provisions of section
14
of the Highway

Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
128.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
